activities: PagerDuty sells an operations performance platform. We use contact information provided by our customers, such as email addresses and phone numbers, to send alerts to our customers, in accordance with the customer’s notification rules and schedule, and to otherwise provide our services to our customers. In addition, when our customers purchase our services, we (or our third-party credit card or payment processor on our behalf)  collect personal information such as our customer credit card number or account information.
